website_summaries.verdict: Traditional candle holder that can be used inside and outside.
pros: Heavy cast iron that won’t blow over
We loved the rustic touch of occasional bubbles in the hand-blown glass
cons: Pricey, especially if you plan to buy several as accents

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Durable Decorative Lantern
customer_reviews.text: This was a great option to display in an art niche in my house. The lantern was well packaged and there was no damage from shipping. There was a note inside from the owner of the company guaranteeing satisfaction and I'm very pleased with the lantern. It's heavy and very well constructed, with a decent quality of glass (included). It pairs well with a Luminara Flameless 7" Candle, though a 9" candle would work as well. I'm pleased with the purchase and would have no qualms purchasing from H. Potter in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lantern as a gift for my Mom for Christmas. I have to be honest, I was quite surprised by how heavy this lantern is. Just the top alone is very heavy. It was packaged perfectly and I'm amazed that the glass inner piece was completely intact when it arrived as it is a thin and very pretty glass center. My Mom uses it indoors however it could definitely be used outdoors as it would take a hurricane force wind to blow it over. I am extremely pleased with the craftmanship of the lantern and plan to by one for myself. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Malanowski

customer_reviews.title: An elegant, welcoming and very well crafted metal and glass lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is an elegant, extremely well made tall lamp I use for a brick post in the walkway to my front door. The top and clear glass chimney are removable so that you can use an LED candle. Because it is so tall, I decided to use two short strings of clear round, remotely controlled LED lights about 2 in diameter. They can be stacked lightly into the tall chimney to expand the lighted area. I’ll likely get another for my back deck.
customer_reviews.author: Msmargaret

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-Duty and Solid
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and solid - No worries about it blowing over - well designed and built. The finish is not very sophisticated or 'old-world authentic' looking, which isn't enough of an issue for me to send back. I'll have my iron-worker re-do the finish for me. In trying to describe the finish..... it's a solid pinkish brown that looks like it's been sponge-dabbed with black. In spite of the finish, It is quite refreshing to see such a well-made product offered - I think H Potter could do better on the paint finish - even if it was just all black.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: ... this on a table on my lanai and I love it. A caution
customer_reviews.text: I put this on a table on my lanai and I love it. A caution. Be sure and get the remote if you are buying a flame less candle to put in this, which I love. But this would be a pain if you had to physically lift the candle every time you turn it off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely impressed with the small lantern I purchased. It was so well packaged that it took a while to get it unwrapped. It’s also very heavy which means it won’t tip over. I’m looking at it now in my great room and thinking, wow, I did good this time! Pardon my English. I can see using it differently in each season; the possibilities are endless. I may have to order the large one also. It’s that beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.  Pricy, but you get what you pay for with this item.
customer_reviews.text: The outdoor hurricane candle lantern is a very nice and sturdy item. The metal aspects are solid and hefty, you would want a reasonable base to set this on. Of note, the top does not connect to the base, so it is best set on something as you won't be able to hang it up unless you make modifications of your own, perhaps future renditions will allow for this. It arrived in great shape, even the glass. I expect to get decades of good use out of this item. It is pricy, but this is one of those cases you get what you pay for. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David Graham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Reasonably Priced
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two large hurricane lanterns from H Potter. I don't normally write reviews but felt compelled as this product is top of the line quality. I have purchased lanterns from Home Goods and Pottery Barn but the lanterns from H Potter were better quality and a better price. They are two stately pieces that fill out a patio table nicely. I usually clump my accessories in threes but these were a stand alone piece.
customer_reviews.author: Lander girl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! They were worth the money. I'm just waiting on the candles to go inside. The quality is top notch! A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lanterns!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but these lanterns are so gorgeous, I had to say something. The pictures online are nice, but in person they are outstanding. Loved the personal note from the designer. I've looked elsewhere for lanterns and they were 3 times the price of these. I have them out on my porch and do not have to worry about wind blowing them over because they are so heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Williams

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful item and well worth the price. The lantern arrived quickly and was packaged extremely well. I love that it is so heavy! Kids can't knock it over nor will the wind blow it over. I purchased the battery operated candle that is pictured with the lantern and they look great together. I also purchased some stones at a local craft store so I could display the lantern as pictured. I've received numerous compliments on this lantern and you will too!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these lanterns
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these lanterns. I have two of the large ones in my backyard and one on the bedroom patio table. I'm using a battery operated candle on a timer - and love the glow that it adds to the outdoors - looks good even in the winter Oregon rain. At Christmas it was fun to use the smaller sized candle on the patio table visible from my dining room. I put a red battery operated candle in it and a nice wreath around it. It was a very easy and inexpensive way to add a nice Christmas touch to the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I've shopped at Amazon for most of my household items for nearly a decade and never left a review. This is beautiful! I've been looking at the Pottery Barn outside candle lanterns for my deck, but these received good ratings and seemed more watertight. I also wanted something more handmade. These are very heavy, very high quality, gorgeous! I am delighted with my purchase! Don't hesitate, you can't do better than this! Thank you for the lovely customer service (carefully packed, a personal note) and the craftsmanship, H. Potter!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Partridge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lantern...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third H Potter lantern. I bought them with the intention to put them out in the yard but they are far too gorgeous to be left outdoors although I am sure it is perfectly fine to do so. I do use them with a flameless candle which works very well. I would not hesitate to buy again. Delivered on time and extremely well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: M. Riedle

customer_reviews.title: Great for battery candles
customer_reviews.text: I placed a remote control candle inside along with pebbles at the base and it looks great. Recommended for settings where you don't plan to move it, but keep it stationery. The lantern is very, very heavy and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Lantern
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the most lovely lantern I have seen. It’s made very well and is quite heavy. The customer service provided by the seller was efficient and courteous. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Hurricane Lanterns
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the set, (both large and small) of H Potter Hurricane Candle Lantern Holders to decorate an entrance ledge. These lanterns are very beautiful, well made, large and heavy, as they are made of cast iron. The finish is an antiqued brown with black touches, which especially compliments rubbed bronze fixtures. The cast iron lid is not attached, but sits on the frame. The glass is slightly bubbled for a quality look. Looks great with 7 and 9-inch candles lit. When we received our set, the globe with the smaller lantern was cut a bit too tall. After notifying the H Potter Company, they sent a replacement glass that fits exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Cmil

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality; very heavy construction, pt. 1
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the larger version for my wife for Mother's Day -- along with the appropriate Luminara candles. She loved them and they accent our patio furniture perfectly. They are of excellent quality; very heavy construction. Also, they come packaged such that damage in transit should be near impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: As far as we are concerned these are the nicest ...
customer_reviews.text: As far as we are concerned these are the nicest hurricane lanterns out there. They are solid, heavy duty and came packaged really well. We have already ordered a couple more in different styles, they go really well both indoors and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't take the time to write a review, however, this beautiful product is so great! I contemplated for some time when buying this online. First, it is heavy and solid. Second, The "iron" is not a rusty looking iron and it is not a black iron. The best way to describe it is a smooth marble brown. It's a little spendy but you get what you pay for. It looks great by our fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Sanwald

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lanters
customer_reviews.text: These lanterns are both beautiful and durable. We have 4 of these now .. 2 of the smaller and now 2 of the large we love these. We have all of them in our home and are beautiful lit with candles in the evening. Whether theirfor inside your home or out on the deck these are a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: S Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lantern! It is very well made and beautiful quality. Like other reviewers, I'm tempted to leave it inside the house where I'll see it more often. I bought the medium and I have it on an outdoor coffee table; it is just the right size and looks perfect there. I am planning to get the large hurricane and put it on the patio near our seating area (rather than on the table). The packaging was perfect and the lantern arrived unharmed. I highly recommend H. Potter products.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Debban

customer_reviews.title: Message not enclosed!  Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, but you never delivered the message which should have been enclosed. The recipient had no idea who had sent the gift and this spoiled it some. It is an expensive gift and more care should have been taken with the message. The recipient insists that there wasn't even a packing slip enclosed. Very sloppy for an ecpensive gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, well made. It is very heavy and would be suitable for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: Indoor use on my mantle. Works well with a 8 inch Luminara candle. The company sent the wrong size glass sleeve but was very prompt in replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Palanci

customer_reviews.title: These lanterns are PERFECT! Craftsmanship is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for two large lanterns for our front porch entry way. These lanterns are PERFECT! Craftsmanship is beautiful. Very, very well made! Nice and sturdy! In fact, I ordered one....loved it so much....I immediately ordered another! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Naples Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely lovely lanterns
customer_reviews.text: This lantern is absolutely worth the money! It is beautiful and rich looking and is of the highest quality of product and workmanship. We bought the large and small. The small is really not small so watch the height shown. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are really beautiful and well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are really beautiful and well worth the money. The metal is really heavy - not some flimsy lightweight thing. I've used flickering flame free candles in mine as they're going to stand outside on a porch. The glass in one package was broken (caused by rough handling during shipping) but I was able to contact the seller direct and he immediately shipped a replacement which arrived in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Classy.
customer_reviews.text: Very classy piece. I use it for decorative purposes and it blends in well with the warm rustic tones of my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Epilocks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. Very heavy lantern- so it will not blow over.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy material. Good quality product. Company stands by their product and works with you on any areas of concern you would have. The glass is hand blown and may have bubbles in it and if so they company will work with you and get you a new one after you send them a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Totterdale

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 3 large that are at varying intervals up the steps to my front door and they look amazing. I like the weight because i
customer_reviews.text: These lanterns are beautiful- exactly as pictured. I ordered 3 large that are at varying intervals up the steps to my front door and they look amazing. I like the weight because i will leave them out all year round (mild climate), and I don't have to worry about them in wind or heavy rains. I will put the remote control candles in them because the lid is heavy and not something I want to take off and put back on a lot. Very happy I spent the money and purchased these. They came quickly, packed well, and completely intact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, great craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding, we bought one in each size for our outdoor patio. The craftsmanship is terrific, they are very heavy (19 lbs) and will not be blown over by wind. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Libbeth

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered both the large and small and they are beautiful. They are really heavy and durable and made ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both the large and small and they are beautiful. They are really heavy and durable and made of cast iron. I absolutely love them and will have a long time as they are such a high quality.
customer_reviews.author: kluless

customer_reviews.title: ... packaged along with a letter stating they would be happy to replace anything that may have been broken during ...
customer_reviews.text: This came well packaged along with a letter stating they would be happy to replace anything that may have been broken during shipping. Such a welcome change from other places who basically say "Tough luck". The quality is superb! One review said the coloring wasn't as nice as the picture but I don't agree. Mine is exactly as the picture. I love it! I'm already thinking of ordering more to give as gifts. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCEPTIONAL!!
customer_reviews.text: Instantly regretted purchasing and tried to cancel, but lantern had already been shipped. LET ME TELL YOU!! You will NOT regret buying this lantern! It is exceptional! Heavy! Oh my! I am ecstatic that I received this. Yes. Maybe you can find a cheaper similar version. But it will not be the quality! EXCEPTIONAL!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Dazy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic service, quality and craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: I currently have this product displayed on top of a large bookshelf....could be used anywhere. This product is of excellent craftsmanship! I was shocked by how heavy it felt...just the lid part is 6 pounds. I am considering buying the larger lanter too. Would make a great gift for many!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: First of all it arrived earlier than expected - which was awesome! Secondly it arrived in perfect condition. It is beyond my expectations. Very high quality. I expect that it will weather well. I'm considering ordering a second lantern. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: oreo

customer_reviews.title: These lanterns are great! Quite large and heavy
customer_reviews.text: These lanterns are great! Quite large and heavy. I have two of these outside and during a major storm with heavy winds, they did not budge an inch. They hold a nice sized candle and give off a nice light. Only issue I had was, having bought two, one had a glass that was a little milky while the other is clear. But that's not enough of a problem to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great lantern...
customer_reviews.text: Packaged extremely well. High quality product. Bought it as a gift, but thinking about purchasing another for myself. Purchased the smaller one and it is huge. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernScribe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Not often does a product quality exceed the description, but that is true in this case. Excellent quality, beautiful, well crafted, carefully packed & protected. I purchased for a wedding present. Anyone who can appreciate a candle lantern will love this. I highly recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Irimescu

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the large and small laterns and they are perfect for our lanai! I am so happy with the quality of these laterns. They are indeed heavy, as other reviews stated, and will not blow over. The finish is beautiful. I used candles that operate on a remote so I don’t have to handle the tops of the laterns to use them. These laterns are definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Gorsuch

customer_reviews.title: Beury meets quality!
customer_reviews.text: This hurricane lantern is gorgeous! It is solid and full of detail. I will be ordering more. I want other sizes to place around the house. Perfect gift ideas as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Quiett

customer_reviews.title: nice, well made
customer_reviews.text: Pretty heavy, not so sure about using as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Arlene soucie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but rusting after one month
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lantern l! Very heavy. After one month of using outdoors, the lid is rusting. The power coating must of not be applied properly. I contacted the company twice by email and they never replied
customer_reviews.author: Donna Waldman

customer_reviews.title: The Lantern is awesome!! It is a beautiful pc of decor ...
customer_reviews.text: The Lantern is awesome!! It is a beautiful pc of decor that really stands out in my foyer!! I absolutely love it!! Well worth the money!! Well packaged to prevent breakage!! I will buy again soon when I find something else I need!! Sincerely, Barbara Willis 😁👍
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: excellent craftmanship, heavy and very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: using outdoors on patio, I would highly recommend a remote flameless candle or flameless candle with timer so the top doesn't have to be removed to power on/off the candle
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Martin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lantern! So amazing that I ordered another
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lantern! So amazing that I ordered another. I now have 2 large ones. Excellent quality and delivered very quickly. Only complaint is that it was delivered USPS the 1st time and was left in a spot where anyone could take. The 2nd delivered via UPS which is way more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Quality, Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product, quite worth the price. In addition, the H Potter company offers great customer service in the event there are any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is so well made! This candle holder will last and last!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Hurricane Candle Lantern
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Hurricane Candle Lantern, it is very heavy so will not tip over. It is actually as shown, I purchased the large and the small and have them both in from of my fireplace. I used remote candles and they look great with the candles turned on. I am so glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L Conrady

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Looks beautiful on our front porch
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality lantern. Love it! Looks beautiful on our front porch.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Foster

customer_reviews.title: Attractive look as well as very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice on our fireplace hearth, especially during evenings when we light the candle and have the fire going.
customer_reviews.author: Judith O. Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This lantern is beautiful well worth the money. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Robbin Meldrim

customer_reviews.title: Great lantern
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor lantern for table or to put on deck floor. Heavy base & will not blow over
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, there is nothing tinny about this product. Should last a very long time outdoors in Texas. Beautiful rustic stature.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: beautiful lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp that will be used in my daughters wedding is perfect for her venue. It arrived quickly and was expertly packaged
customer_reviews.author: judy k.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Just received my lantern. I LOVE it! I was pleasantly surprised at how heavy it is! Looks perfect on the mantel!
customer_reviews.author: Rmwp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite decorative piece lately. I have battery remote twinkle lights in it. It's beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Smith

customer_reviews.title: OMG they are beautiful and not made in China which is a must ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG they are beautiful and not made in China which is a must in our house!!! They are made to be outdoors I'm impressed with the weight. I got real candles 12" should have done 9" they are perfect. Thank you for such a quality product I'll be watching your site, and a return customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disspointed
customer_reviews.text: The lantern came lopsided, all the slates where not horilzontile. As if something twisted the top from the bottom of lantern . Its not pronounced but distracting in appearance . The first small lantern that I ordered was perfect.. Because of this I am rating it with 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Kahn

customer_reviews.title: ... place on top of waterfall columns around our pool--very sturdy and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to place on top of waterfall columns around our pool--very sturdy and heavy, and very esthetically pleasing to behold! A nice addition to our backyard and pool areas....
customer_reviews.author: Julie C. Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Love the lanterns!
customer_reviews.text: These lanterns will be a beautiful addition to our outside patio area - especially with all the wind in our area!
customer_reviews.author: darcy h.

customer_reviews.title: The lantern is a bit heavier than I expected, but not too much.  A bit heavier is better than too light.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Lantern!!!! We are very-very happy with our purchase. Thank you and Merry Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for a birthday gift and it is beautiful. Worth the money. It was packed well and is very heavy. The recipient was thrilled and placed it on a stone wall on their patio. Looks amazing. They are looking to purchase more to add to their patio.
customer_reviews.author: DKB

customer_reviews.title: It’s very heavy which is exactly what I wanted.  Wind won’t be blowing it over when outside.
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful & fits in so many spotsmaround my home & outside. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two small outdoor lanterns and I'm very pleased. They are beautifully made and arrived in perfect condition. You won't regret purchasing these lanterns.
customer_reviews.author: dale brown

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to go outside - will make a great impression in my garden seating area
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and packed. Purchased to go outside - will make a great impression in my garden seating area.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Finger

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! I get compliments on them all the time! Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Englehart

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality, but requires bottom should be better protected (during rain leaves a rusty mark on the patio tile)
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. I got one as a gift and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how heavy it was. Very good quality. I got one as a gift and had to have another!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, packed securely, absolutely beautiful! I am buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works well looks good
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, candle burns well even in a stiff breeze
customer_reviews.author: Martin S.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered one of these lanterns--loved it--ordered a second lamp ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these lanterns--loved it--ordered a second lamp and it came with the glass broken--I think from handling--wrote to H. Potter--they could not have been more helpful--they then took care of everything--they went above my expectations--thanks--G
customer_reviews.author: George Riddiford

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased that the lanterns are substantial
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased that the lanterns are substantial. They arrived in perfect condition, and fit the candle I wanted to use for each of them. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Novak

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Durable
customer_reviews.text: The lanterns are high quality and worth the price. They are heavy so they will not blow over in a storm and the style is very high end. Definitely one of the best lanterns I have looked and they will last. Customer service was great and I would recommend this product without any hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bizub

customer_reviews.title: Top notch hurricane candle holders
customer_reviews.text: These hurricane holders are fabulous. Good looking and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: karen g ritter

customer_reviews.title: Brass, sturdy candle holder
customer_reviews.text: Just gorgeous, well made candle lantern. So impressed with the worksmanship. And high quality. Was going to use on porch but thought it was too nice to display outside.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Snell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: NICER THAN I EXPECTED. THE PICTURE DOESN'T DO IT JUSTICE. IM GOING TO PURCHASE ONE FOR MYSELF.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these lanterns and they were very well packed upon arrival. These are really nice and I feel will last as long as you desire to have them around! Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rita S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Well made! Looks great on the mantle! Arrived in two days. Packaged securely to prevent breakage.
customer_reviews.author: william miasek

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy enough not to get knocked over by the wind. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: RocketGranny

customer_reviews.title: Love the lantern
customer_reviews.text: Love the lantern, but the inside glass is slightly too high and as a result the lid does not sit securely. Will need replacement.
customer_reviews.author: CAS

customer_reviews.title: Great lantern!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous solid lantern! Should last forever. Packaging was great. Fast shipping. Love this lantern!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Thomason

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty lantern. I will be ordering another soon-they look ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Pretty lantern. I will be ordering another soon-they look really nice in a group! The lantern arrived on time and packaged well but the glass was broken. I asked for a replacement and received one with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Silveri

customer_reviews.title: What a beautiful lantern! !!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely stunning. It's solid heavy and NOT your typical outside lantern. Don't hesitate to buy this. I bought both a large and small and couldn't believe how nice it was when I unwrapped them!
customer_reviews.author: Tree Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both large & small sizes. They were packed securely and arrived in perfect condition. They are heavy so I won't have to worry about blowing over in the wind. Beautiful! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: RABAge

customer_reviews.title: Work of art
customer_reviews.text: I simply LOVE the way this piece looks in my rustic mountain lake home. It's made of heavy metal that looks like bronze. I put a remote controlled candle inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautifully crafted. I thought they were hanging
customer_reviews.text: Top quality, beautifully crafted. I thought they were hanging, but are not--so pretty I am keeping and using on my outdoor table.
customer_reviews.author: Texas MJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy lanterns.
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for nice lanterns for some time. I bought two to put on my sofa table and I'm so happy I did. The quality of these lanterns far surpasses any that I saw in local retail stores for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: ... not realize how heavy they would be but I like the heaviness
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize how heavy they would be but I like the heaviness. They are just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Maralee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent craftsmanship. Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent craftsmanship. Exactly what I expected. Very heavy and quality product. Will buy the larger lantern.
customer_reviews.author: happyporch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE my new lanterns. Ordered a large and a small. Very well made. They are forever treasures!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Malone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this lantern. It's very heavy and beautiful. I'm using it inside our cabin home.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gaydos

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy which make it a great lantern and is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This product's glass was delivery broken but was quickly replaced the very next day. It's heavy which make it a great lantern and is beautiful! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: elaina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality and sturdy lantern. And it was packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa Evans

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lantern!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and seller resolved broken glass issue immediately. Very solid. I use indoors but would also be beautiful outside.
customer_reviews.author: Tybeedee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect in every way..this is not your boxstore lantern...it is beautiful..
customer_reviews.author: pd

customer_reviews.title: Candle works fine with remote
customer_reviews.text: Potter promptly replaced the glass broken in shipment. Candle works fine with remote.
customer_reviews.author: Don Gralen

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!  I LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite items in the house. I just love having it lit on dark stormy days. We live in an area with lots of those, so this helps chase the winter blues away and gives our home a warm, inviting feel. The lantern its self is just beautiful and the quality is top notch. I appreciate the fine craftsmanship and the hand blown glass. I got the small size and it's plenty big for indoors. I plan to use it outdoors this spring & summer and may even add another one or two. It was well packed and arrived in perfect condition including the glass. One of the best purchases I've made!
customer_reviews.author: Angelinrags

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This is a substantial candle lantern. I purchased one large and one small and there's quite a difference in the size. The large is very large! I purchased these for my fireplace hearth and am using battery operated candles in them. They are gorgeous. There is more depth and variation to the color than what shows in the photos--I had been concerned that they would blend into the black fireplace surround but they do not. These lanterns were so well packaged that I can't imagine any damage every occurring during shipment! They would not blow over outside either and I like the idea of being able to temporarily use them for an outdoor party this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Faith B

product_meta.title: H Potter Large Decorative Hurricane Lantern Glass Candle Holder Cast Iron Rustic Indoor and Outdoor Light with Powder Coat Finish Centerpiece for Home Wedding Farmhouse Decor
feature_bullets: VINTAGE STYLE LANTERN FOR ALL SEASONS – At 23 inches tall by 10 inches wide, this large lantern will make a great focal point and impressive statement wherever it’s placed. Top hook is decorative not functional, not designed to hang. Unique & sturdy, the heavy weight makes it perfect for an outdoor setting, without the worry of it toppling over on windy days. If you’re looking for something different, this beautiful hurricane lantern would make a perfect wedding decoration or birthday gift idea.

GLASS HURRICANE WITH POWDER COAT FINISH – Heavy cast iron construction with a charcoal brown powder coat finish for aesthetic rustic appeal, this large lantern creates a dazzling effect on any patio deck or sturdy table. Complete with glass hurricane which may include bubbles due to being handcrafted (candle and rocks not included) and designed to add character to your living space, the lantern top lifts off for a candle to be placed, and is designed for table and floor display only.

A WARM, WELCOMING GLOW FOR VISITORS – Lanterns not only enhance an environment but can offer a touch of elegant beauty to your home and garden. Uniquely designed with a heavy, durable construction, the H Potter hurricane lantern is perfect for alfresco dining and outdoor living. An ideal mood setter, this hurricane lantern offers a welcome glow, lighting up your summer bbqs and sheltering candles from the wind.

HEAVY AND DURABLE IRON CONSTRUCTION – Built to last, this classic lantern showcases breathable top vents and hurricane glass set within a cast iron frame. Used night or day, stunning set as a pair beside the fireplace, in a hallway straddling the front door or next to potted ferns. Simple enough to blend with any decor, a pillar or remote control candle will provide ambient reflection through the beautifully crafted metalwork.

QUALITY BY H POTTER – H Potter has been designing and manufacturing premium quality garden products since 1997. We do not pretend to be the cheapest, but you get what you pay for. Packaged well, with stunning craftsmanship and backed by great customer service, we’re proud to say our garden products are built to last
